quotes.quote: “You can have anything you want in life if you dress for it.”
quotes.author: Edith Head

quotes.quote: “Fashion is the armor to survive the reality of everyday life.”
quotes.author: Bill Cunningham

quotes.quote: “Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.”
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: “The joy of dressing is an art.”
quotes.author: John Galliano

quotes.quote: “In difficult times, fashion is always outrageous.”
quotes.author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quotes.quote: “Fashion is what youâ€™re offered four times a year by designers. And style is what you choose.”
quotes.author: Lauren Hutton

quotes.quote: “Fashion is very important. It is life-enhancing and, like everything that gives pleasure, it is worth doing well.”
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: “Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak.”
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: “Elegance is not standing out, but being remembered.”
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: “What you wear is how you present yourself to the world, especially today, when human contacts are so quick. Fashion is instant language.”
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.quote: “In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.”
quotes.author: Coco Chanel
